Name: logiCally
About the game: logiCally is a game designed to test the skills of logic, observation and mental calculation. On each turn the player must choose one of the three problems shown. Solving it correctly will provide various rewards. Gather the required keys to unlock the next difficulty level. All problems are procedurally generated, guaranteeing that they will never be the same. How far can you get? Features 2 game modes: Timed and Survival Practice mode. 8 different types of problems. 9 difficulty levels. Infinite replayability. Relaxing. Challenging. Note: Steam overlay not supported.
